dimensions.name: Time
dimensions.description: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. This dimension is set automatically.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. This dimension is set automatically.

dimensions.name: CP Code
dimensions.description: Identifier assigned to a contract associated with a particular stream.
dimensions.helpText: Identifier assigned to a contract associated with a particular stream.

metrics.name: Avg Packet Loss
metrics.description: Measures the quality of connection between Encoder and Entry Point. Provides connection level ratio of data packets(bytes) lost to the data packets(bytes) sent by Encoder.
